resources.string: 1. General Library: Sunday-Thursday (9:00am to 5:00pm) \n 2. Reading Hall: Sunday-Thursday (9:00am to 10:00pm) and Friday (9:00am to 12:00pm) \n 3. Browsing Room: Saturday (4:00am to 9:00pm)
The libraries mission is to provide comprehensive resources and service in support of the research, teaching and learning needs of the university community.

Develop a world class knowledge resource center and provide innovative new services and collection to the teaching, learning and research communities, using latest technological developments of 21st century.
